name: Lingvanex
description: Lingvanex provides AI-powered translation and speech recognition tools for seamless communication across over 100 languages.
longDescription: Lingvanex is an AI-driven platform offering advanced machine translation and speech recognition solutions for businesses and individuals. It supports over 110 languages, enabling users to translate text, documents, audio, and images with high accuracy and speed. The platform emphasizes secure, scalable, and customizable tools, including on-premise options for data-sensitive organizations. Its mission is to break language barriers, streamline communication, and enhance global connectivity through cutting-edge natural language processing technologies. Lingvanex serves diverse industries, from enterprise workflows to personal language learning, with both free and premium offerings. The platform also provides API integration for businesses to embed translation capabilities into their applications.
features: Instantly translates text in over 110 languages directly in the browser for seamless communication.
Supports document translation for formats like PDF and DOCX, ensuring quick and secure file processing.
Provides speech recognition and text-to-speech in 91 languages for accurate voice translation.
Offers image recognition to extract and translate text from images on webpages or uploaded files.
Enables full-page website translation with a single click for effortless browsing in any language.
Provides offline translation in 45 languages for users without internet access.
Includes phonetic transcription and transliteration to assist with pronunciation and language learning.
Offers API integration for businesses to embed translation services into their products or workflows.
Supports Slack integration for translating messages in channels or direct messages in real-time.
Provides on-premise translation and speech recognition solutions for secure, high-volume data processing.
Saves up to 5,000 translations in history and bookmarks for easy access across platforms.
Delivers sentiment analysis to categorize text as positive, negative, or neutral for business insights.

faqs.question: What languages does Lingvanex support?
faqs.answer: Lingvanex supports over 110 languages, including English, Spanish, Arabic, Chinese, and less common languages like Kurdish and Samoan.

faqs.question: Is Lingvanex free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes, Lingvanex offers free text translation without signup, but some advanced features may require a paid plan or API subscription.

faqs.question: Can Lingvanex translate documents?
faqs.answer: Yes, users can upload files like PDF or DOCX for fast, secure translation into over 100 languages.

faqs.question: Does Lingvanex offer offline translation?
faqs.answer: Yes, offline translation is available in 45 languages, ideal for users without internet access.

faqs.question: How secure is Lingvanex for sensitive data?
faqs.answer: Lingvanex uses encrypted communication and offers on-premise solutions to ensure data privacy for businesses.

faqs.question: Can I integrate Lingvanex into my application?
faqs.answer: Yes, Lingvanex provides a Translation API for seamless integration into business products and workflows.

faqs.question: Does Lingvanex support voice translation?
faqs.answer: Yes, it offers speech recognition and text-to-speech in 91 languages for accurate voice translation.

faqs.question: What is the cost of the Translation API?
faqs.answer: The API costs $5 per million characters, with discounts for bulk purchases, or $10 per day for on-premise solutions.

faqs.question: Can Lingvanex translate entire webpages?
faqs.answer: Yes, Lingvanex can translate full webpages with a single click, enhancing multilingual browsing.

faqs.question: Does Lingvanex offer a mobile app?
faqs.answer: Yes, Lingvanex Translator is available on iOS and Android for text, voice, and image translation.
